solution_line_template: So far, time spent practicing backstroke, breaststroke, and butterfly is {backstroke_hours} + {breaststroke_hours} + {butterfly_hours} = <<{backstroke_hours}+{breaststroke_hours}+{butterfly_hours}={completed_hours}>>{completed_hours} hours

Since Rita's must swim {total_required_hours} hours, the freestyle and sidestroke practice sessions will take {total_required_hours} - {completed_hours} = <<{total_required_hours}-{completed_hours}={remaining_hours}>>{remaining_hours} hours
Rita will practice for {hours_per_month} hours/month, meaning she will meet her coach's target in {remaining_hours}/{hours_per_month} = {months_needed} months.
